short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to keep your favorite TV shows spoiler-free

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of accidental spoilers ruining your favorite TV shows? 

Spoilo's got your back! With one click, keep your shows spoiler-free and enjoy every twist and turn. Say goodbye to surprise spoilers and hello to pure TV joy. 

Try Spoilo for free now!

Please note: 
This is the testing version of the extension, where you can add one TV show at a time. We're in development mode, working on a full product that will allow you to add as many shows as you like. If you have questions or find any bugs, please share your feedback with our community on Discord.
